tier.item: (25) Punyja-lkura ngaja papa. Manyja ngaja. Manya ngajuku papa!
"I want to drink water/I'm ready to drink water. I'm thirsty. Give me water!"
(25) Punyja-lkura ngaja papa. Manyja ngaja. Manya ngajuku papa!
"I want to drink water/I'm ready to drink water. I'm thirsty. Give me water!"
Punyja-lkura ngaja papa. Manyja ngaja. Manya ngajuku papa!
I want to drink water/I'm ready to drink water. I'm thirsty. Give me water!
"Now, I'm ready to eat/I'll eat because I'm hungry."
"Now, I'm ready to eat/I'll eat because I'm hungry."
Now, I'm ready to eat/I'll eat because I'm hungry.

tier.item: "I want to/I'm going to cook fish, because I'm hungry."
"I want to/I'm going to cook fish, because I'm hungry."
I want to/I'm going to cook fish, because I'm hungry.

tier.item: (28) a. Nguja parti-lamu para, nguja, yapanpa.
b. Yapanpa nguja-ngka wanyja-lku para yapanpa, nguja-ngka.
c. That parta kunyingka-punyjarri, that nother one, that.
d. Wanyji-lku martu, martu wanyji-lku, wanyji-lku martu,
dig-PROSP hole hole dig-PROSP dig-PROSP hole
e. that one much long, makanu martu. You put'em marnta now, pala-ngka.
f. Wanyja-lkura martu-ngka, marnta. Marnta you put'em finish'im.
g. Nguja pulara you put'em kankarni. Parti-la nguja-ngka.
h. You put him nguja-ngka now. When he yinngarra-ngarri-nyjanu-la,
j. You cover 'im up yayin-karta-lu now. Yayin put'em kankarni.
k. And he jarta-lkura kanyji-kujalpa nganyja-ku, jarta-lkura.
l. Parti-la thru-n-thru now. Wanpari parti-la.
a. "You would light a fire for [the emu], fire and hot stones.
b. Then put the stones in the fire for it, hot stones in the fire.
c. That other (fire) is for the ashes, the other one.
d. Then dig a hole, dig a hole, dig a hole,
e. that long, a long hole. Then put the rocks in it.
f. Put the rocks there in the hole. Put the rocks there and finish it off.
g. You put the fire on top. It cooks in the fire.
h. You put it in the fire now. When it's burned down to coals,
i. then you put [the emu] there in the fire.
j. You cover it over with iron now. Put the iron on top.
k. And next you cover the two ends with sand, to cover it over.
l. It cooks through and through now. Cooks well."

a. Nguja parti-lamu para, nguja, yapanpa. b. Yapanpa nguja-ngka wanyja-lku para yapanpa, nguja-ngka. c. That parta kunyingka-punyjarri, that nother one, that. d. Wanyji-lku martu, martu wanyji-lku, wanyji-lku martu, e. that one much long, makanu martu. You put'em marnta now, pala-ngka. f. Wanyja-lkura martu-ngka, marnta. Marnta you put'em finish'im. g. Yayin put'em kankarni. k. And he jarta-lkura kanyji-kujalpa nganyja-ku, jarta-lkura. l. Parti-la thru-n-thru now. Wanpari parti-la.

You would light a fire for [the emu], fire and hot stones. b. Then put the stones in the fire for it, hot stones in the fire. c. That other (fire) is for the ashes, the other one. d. Then dig a hole, dig a hole, dig a hole, e. that long, a long hole. Then put the rocks in it. f. Put the rocks there in the hole. Put the rocks there and finish it off. g. You put the fire on top. It cooks in the fire. h. You put it in the fire now. When it's burned down to coals, i. then you put [the emu] there in the fire. j. You cover it over with iron now. Put the iron on top. k. And next you cover the two ends with sand, to cover it over. l. It cooks through and through now. Cooks well.

igt.tag-types: L B G B L B G B L B G B T B T

tier.item: "They used to pull it out (of the water). It would dry. They would roll it now.
Roll and roll and roll and roll it into a ball. They would make it into a ball now."
"They used to pull it out (of the water). It would dry. They would roll it now.
Roll and roll and roll and roll it into a ball. They would make it into a ball now."
Purri-lkamu-ya. Pujaparri-yamu. Jurrka-lkamu-ya now. Jurrka-lkura, jurrka-lkura, jurrka-lkura, jurrka-lkura, wapurta. Wapurta-ya-lamu-ya now ...
pull-USIT-3pl dry-USIT roll-USIT-3pl roll-PROSP roll-PROSP roll-PROSP roll-PROSP ball ball-CAUS-USIT-3pl
They used to pull it out (of the water). It would dry. They would roll it now. Roll and roll and roll and roll it into a ball. They would make it into a ball now.
